tool_description: Validates role assignments against organizational access policies and security requirements.

user_identifier.description: User identifier to validate policies for

role_assignments.description: List of role IDs to validate

policy_set.description: Policy set to validate against: corporate, regulatory, industry, custom

include_warnings.description: Include policy warnings in addition to violations

department.description: User's department for department-specific policy checks

employment_type.description: Employment type: full_time, part_time, contractor, vendor

error_messages: Invalid user identifier: User identifier must be a non-empty string.
Empty role list: At least one role assignment must be provided for validation.
Invalid policy set: Use one of [corporate, regulatory, industry, custom].
Invalid validation level: Use one of [permissive, standard, strict].
Invalid employment type: Use one of [full_time, part_time, contractor, vendor].
Policy validation failed: Unable to complete validation due to policy engine error.
usage: Provide user_identifier, role_assignments array, and policy_set. Optionally specify validation_level, department, and employment_type for context-aware policy validation.

validation_result.description: Overall validation result: passed, failed, warning

policy_warnings.description: List of policy warnings if requested
